C

CCT - Static variable in class ili.lights.LightEvent
 
CCTLight - Class in ili.lights
The CCTLight is a subclass of the Light object and contains a range of warm-white to cool-white light.
CCTLight() - Constructor for class ili.lights.CCTLight
Create a new CCTLight source with standard parameters.
CCTLight(int, int) - Constructor for class ili.lights.CCTLight
Create a new CCTLight source with the specified intensity and cct (0-255) range standard.
COLOR - Static variable in class ili.lights.LightEvent
 
ColorLight - Class in ili.lights
The ColorLight is a subclass of the Light object and contains a light color, that can be set using RGB and HSB parameters
ColorLight() - Constructor for class ili.lights.ColorLight
Empty constructor, creates standard Colored light.
ColorLight(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class ili.lights.ColorLight
Creates a colored light with the specified intensity and the specified R, G, and B values.
COOLWHITE - Static variable in class ili.lights.CCTLight

L

Light - Class in ili.lights
This is a general light object which contains a light state (on/off) and an intensity, and intensity range and can be used to create representations of light sources
Light() - Constructor for class ili.lights.Light
Creates a standard light object with default settings intensity at 255, range from 0-255.
Light(int) - Constructor for class ili.lights.Light
Creates a new light object with the intensity set to the specified value.
LightEvent - Class in ili.lights
The LightEvent is a subclass of EventObject and is thrown by light sources when any of their parameters change.
LightEvent(Object) - Constructor for class ili.lights.LightEvent
Creates a new LightEvent.
LightEvent(Object, int) - Constructor for class ili.lights.LightEvent
Creates a new LightEvent.
lightEventReceived(LightEvent) - Method in interface ili.lights.LightListener
 
LightListener - Interface in ili.lights

Even it thrown when the light source is turned off (state)

Turns the light source off and fires an event.

Turns the light source off and fires an event if argument is set to true.

Turns the light source on and sets the intensity to the getMaxIntensity() and fires an event.
turnOn(boolean) - Method in class ili.lights.Light
Turns the light source on and determine if you fire an event (true = fire event) to all listeners.
